overview:
Nissim brings over 15 years of experience in research and development, including technology, software architecture, product development, management and strategy. He previously served in a management position at HP Software where he was responsible for the product management of strategic software products. Prior to that, Nissim served in various management positions in Mercury Interactive R&D.

Nissim holds a B.S.c in Computer Science and Mathematics, cum laude, from the Tel-Aviv University.
